meanings.definition: To imitate the appearance or character of
meanings.sent1: The robot simulates a human by walking and talking like one.
meanings.sent2: The flight simulator simulates flying a plane in different weather conditions.
meanings.sent3: The child simulates being a superhero by wearing a cape and running around.
meanings.sent4: The artist simulates the beauty of nature in their paintings.
meanings.sent5: The virtual reality game simulates a magical world where players can explore freely.

meanings.definition: To create a computer model of
meanings.sent1: Scientists use computers to simulate the behavior of complex systems.
meanings.sent2: The software simulates the movement of planets in our solar system.
meanings.sent3: The students simulate a volcano eruption using a computer program for their science project.
meanings.sent4: The engineers simulate the stress on a bridge before construction begins.
meanings.sent5: The simulation simulates a car crash to test the safety features of the vehicle.

meanings.definition: To pretend to have or feel
meanings.sent1: She simulates excitement when receiving a surprise gift.
meanings.sent2: He simulates interest in a topic he knows nothing about.
meanings.sent3: The actor simulates fear on stage during the thrilling scene.
meanings.sent4: The child simulates being a doctor by using a toy stethoscope.
meanings.sent5: The politician simulates concern for the environment to gain votes.
